0.6.1.name: wordpress/imdb-link-transformer
0.6.1.description:
Visit Official website to comment, get help, and so on.

IMDb changed its search method Please prefer "imdbltid" method in your post/widget rather than "imdblt"

IMDb link transformer aims to ease the movies information search process, for both writer and reader. All movies names which are tagged between < !--imdb-->nameMovie< !--/imdb--> are automatically turned into an url. This url can open a new window (a popup) containing many useful data related to the movie itself. IMDb link transformer transforms all the words you tagged into links to an informative windows. It means one can view the filmmaker, the casting or the goofs that IMDb (or similar) website includes with one click; it can show either the director or the movie related dat
